name: HealthBlox
description: For healthcare companies seeking deeper integrations with their customers, we provide tools for building EHR-centric pathways for care orchestration, patient management and value delivery. By doing so, we are trying to build the largest, horizontally-scaled repository of structured Health Data.
one_liner: For healthcare companies seeking deeper integrations with their customers, we provide tools for building EHR-centric pathways for care orchestration, patient management and value delivery. By doing so, we are trying to build the largest, horizontally-scaled repository of structured Health Data.
